What is an important limitation to note when creating a PBaaS chain using the Verus Desktop, especially if you want to use a currency like BTC or ETH?

If a currency is already supported in the Verus Desktop, such as BTC or ETH, you will not be able to use those same named currencies as a PBaaS chain. This limitation is considered errata for this testnet release and will not be a limitation before mainnet availability.

What kind of warnings may users encounter when installing the software, and what do they mean?

Some antivirus software, such as Avast and Kaspersky, may flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program). These warnings are not because the software is malicious, but because it includes mining software that could potentially be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
